review: It only took a few minutes to set up. Works great without any problems and it is located at the other end of the house from the wireless router plus I do not have especially fast internet.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Not very useful if you HDMI port is in the back of the TV vs. the side. :(
author: WeeklybargainDiva

review: I am a big admirer of amazon and its products and slowly in the process of accumulating them in my apartment.I have a kindle Fire HDX, Fire TV stick and now Echo. But I have to say the stick is kind of disappointing in the sense that it is really slow. There is a lot of lag from the time I press a button and I see the icon selected on the screen move. It's even worse while using Youtube.It constantly gets disconnected from my wi-fi while my phones and laptop do not have any issues with connectivity to internet.I really hope the Amazon Fire TV module is faster than this Fire TV stick. I hope I can just get the fire TV instead of the stick and pray for it to be faster.
author: Venkata Ajay Pappu

review: The Fire TV Stick really does a great job.  The music is clear and the sound quality is excellent.  Now we also have access to many more movies and videos.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Not complely locked down so you can sideload apps to it.
author: Ernest

review: I have had a lot of problems getting the fire stick to stream, costing more money to get wifi extenders and other things. I have to reboot it almost every time to watch it. It has all the same features as the Fire TV, I've had zero problem with the Fire TV. It's really just a hassle.
author: Jennifer Greer

review: I really wanted to like the Fire TV Stick, but it's been a total dud. I've spent an hour trying to get it up and running and it keeps telling me it can't connect to Amazon.com. We have other devices, like laptops and a PS3, in the same room that have no connectivity issues. I've reset my router, turned my tv off/on, unplugged the Fire TV Stick and it's just not working. Unfortunately I bought two of these - one for us and one for my parents for Christmas. Looks like I'm going to have to get something else :(
author: Michele Cruz

review: Wow! I am so pleased with my Fire TV Stick.  Very easy to setup and lots of available movies and more for me to watch. It is great for my Amazon Prime viewing and YouTube and on and on!!!I will have to purchase another one of these.
author: Ted "tedpas"

review: This is awesome! My family loves it! I like the apps and the ability to listen to music and watch videos on demand. The music I had in my Amazon account plays as karaoke! Couldn't believe it, but we sure had some fun with it. The kids like the games too. I had a Chromecast before and this is 100 times better.
